role.argrole: with what - usually marked by ب

example.parse: (S (S (NP-TPC-2 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM المعنيون)) (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يلهون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1P نا)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الدائرة) (DET+ADJ_COMP الكبرى) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الواحدة)) (SBAR (WHNP-3 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_1P نحن)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ضد) (NP (NP (PRON_3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-3)))))))))) (PUNC "))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: with the big cycle which we are against
